meaningMnemonic:
I have <kanji>certain</kanji> <kanji>demand</kanji>s for <kanji>goods</kanji> to take on this trip. Don't worry, it's just the <vocabulary>necessities</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>essentials</vocabulary>.

必需品 is a relatively formal word that refers to items that are necessary for daily life, survival, or specific activities.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
